name: ToyBox Puzzle
description:
We had so much fun playing with all these toys, but we can't just leave all of this mess behind!
Don't worry though, the excitement is not over yet, we're about to learn how organizing your mess can be a whole new way of having fun.

  • Practice your organization skills and critical thinking:
Simple to understand, just drag and drop all the pieces and try to fit everything inside the boxes.

  • More than 99 levels and 54 different types of toys to organize:
Many shapes and designs appear throughout the levels to keep the gameplay fresh.

  • Super secret ending for the completionists:
Did you beat all the levels? Surprise! There's even more! New levels with extra challenge and a second ending are waiting for you.

  • Cute and colorful graphics:
Friendly for a younger audience, fun and challenging for the entire family.

  • Easy to play:
Just use your computer mouse! Click, drag and drop the pieces. That's all you gotta do to master the game!
Stuck in a level? You can skip a few puzzles and come back to them later when you have more practice.

  • Original music:
Fun soundtrack with toy-like sounds specially made for the game.
